ETYMOLOGY: Initialism of 'United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland'.
SINCE: 1920s (as common initialism following the full state name adoption in 1927)

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The short form for the sovereign state known as the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, an island nation located off the northwestern coast of continental Europe.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: “大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国”的简称，是位于欧洲大陆西北海岸的一个主权岛国。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Goods imported from outside the EU must meet certain standards when entering the UK.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 来自欧盟以外的进口货物进入英国时必须符合某些标准。

REGISTER: Standard; used globally in contexts of politics, travel, and commerce.
